title: Football Game Selector
description: The Football Game Selector is a mobile-friendly webpage designed to allow the user to pick who they think will win each football game throughout the season and make their pick for the championship.
By taking a csv file with a schedule in it, this page is able to derive the league standings and playoff seeds based on the user's picks.
This page is very portable and versatile as it is written in object-oriented javascript and has no server-side dependencies.
